üåç GLOBAL AVAILABILITY
======================================================================

Anyone in the world can now:

1. Install from PyPI:
   pip install rafael-framework

2. Clone from GitHub:
   git clone https://github.com/Rafael2022-prog/rafael.git

3. Initialize project:
   rafael init my-project

4. Star on GitHub:
   https://github.com/Rafael2022-prog/rafael

5. Contribute:
   Submit pull requests and issues

üöÄ NEXT STEPS (Optional)
======================================================================

Docker Deployment:
  1. Start Docker Desktop
  2. docker build -t rafaelframework/rafael:1.0.0 .
  3. docker test locally
  4. docker push rafaelframework/rafael:latest

Community Building:
  1. Write announcement blog post
  2. Post on social media (Twitter, LinkedIn)
  3. Share on Reddit (r/Python, r/programming)
  4. Submit to Hacker News
  5. Create demo video
